    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_CORTEXM4, CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX, CONFIG_STM32_STM32F427, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_FPU
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32F427Z: STM32F427Z

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_CORTEXM4, CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX, CONFIG_STM32_STM32F427, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_FPU
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32F427I: STM32F427I

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_CORTEXM4, CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX, CONFIG_STM32_STM32F427, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_FPU
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32F429V: STM32F429V

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_CORTEXM4, CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX, CONFIG_STM32_STM32F429, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_FPU
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32F429Z: STM32F429Z

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_CORTEXM4, CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX, CONFIG_STM32_STM32F429, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_FPU
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32F429I: STM32F429I

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_CORTEXM4, CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX, CONFIG_STM32_STM32F429, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_FPU
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32F429B: STM32F429B

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_CORTEXM4, CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX, CONFIG_STM32_STM32F429, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_FPU
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32F429N: STM32F429N

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_CORTEXM4, CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX, CONFIG_STM32_STM32F429, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_FPU
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.55 CONFIG_STM32_SBL: Secondary bootloader

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , !CONFIG_STM32_VALUELINE
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Configure and position code for use with the STMicro DFU bootloader. Do not select this option if you will load code using JTAG/SWM.

1.2.56 Menu: STM32 Peripheral Support

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.56.1 CONFIG_STM32_ADC1: ADC1

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_STM32_ADC
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.56.2 CONFIG_STM32_ADC2: ADC2

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_STM32_ADC
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_HAVE_ADC2
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.56.3 CONFIG_STM32_ADC3: ADC3

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_STM32_ADC
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_HAVE_ADC3
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_STM32_ADC
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_HAVE_ADC4
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.56.5 CONFIG_STM32_COMP: COMP

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32L15XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.56.6 CONFIG_STM32_BKP: BKP

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.56.7 CONFIG_STM32_BKPSRAM: BKP RAM

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F207 || CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_CAN, CONFIG_STM32_CAN
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_HAVE_CAN1
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_HAVE_CAN2
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean

  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_DMA
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , !CONFIG_STM32_VALUELINE || (CONFIG_STM32_VALUELINE && CONFIG_STM32_HIGHDENSITY)
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F207 || CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.56.20 CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC: Ethernet MAC

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_NETDEVICES, CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_PHY
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_HAVE_ETHMAC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.56.21 CONFIG_STM32_FSMC: FSMC

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_HAVE_FSMC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.56.22 CONFIG_STM32_HASH: HASH

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F207 || CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.56.23 CONFIG_STM32_I2C1: I2C1

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_STM32_I2C
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.56.24 CONFIG_STM32_I2C2: I2C2

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_STM32_I2C
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , !(CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_LOWDENSITY)
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.56.25 CONFIG_STM32_I2C3: I2C3

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_STM32_I2C
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F207 || CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.56.26 CONFIG_STM32_LTDC: LTDC

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F429
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    The STM32 LTDC is an LCD-TFT Display Controller available on the STM32F429 and STM32F439 devices. It is a standard parallel video interface (HSYNC, VSYNC, etc.) for controlling TFT LCD displays.

1.2.56.27 CONFIG_STM32_DMA2D: DMA2D

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F429
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    The STM32 DMA2D is an Chrom-Art Accelerator for image manipulation available on the STM32F429 and STM32F439 devices.

1.2.56.28 CONFIG_STM32_OTGFS: OTG FS

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_HAVE_OTGFS
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F207 || CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX || CONFIG_STM32_STM32F429
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n

  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean

  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.57 Menu: Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.57.1 Choice: CAN1 Alternate Pin Mappings

  • Default: STM32_CAN1_NO_REMAP
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_CAN1
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_STM32_CAN1_NO_REMAP: No pin remapping

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_CAN1_REMAP1: CAN1 alternate pin remapping #1

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_CAN1_REMAP2: CAN1 alternate pin remapping #2

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.57.2 CONFIG_STM32_CAN2_REMAP: CAN2 Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_CONNECTIVITYLINE && CONFIG_STM32_CAN2
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.57.3 CONFIG_STM32_CEC_REMAP: CEC Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_CEC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.57.4 CONFIG_STM32_ETH_REMAP: Ethernet Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_CONNECTIVITYLINE && CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.57.5 CONFIG_STM32_I2C1_REMAP: I2C1 Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_I2C1
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.57.6 CONFIG_STM32_SPI1_REMAP: SPI1 Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_SPI1
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.57.7 CONFIG_STM32_SPI3_REMAP: SPI3 Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_SPI3 && !CONFIG_STM32_VALUELINE
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.57.8 Choice: TIM1 Alternate Pin Mappings

  • Default: STM32_TIM1_NO_REMAP
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_TIM1
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM1_NO_REMAP: No pin remapping

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM1_FULL_REMAP: Full pin remapping

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM1_PARTIAL_REMAP: Partial pin remapping

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.57.9 Choice: TIM2 Alternate Pin Mappings

  • Default: STM32_TIM2_NO_REMAP
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_TIM2
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM2_NO_REMAP: No pin remapping

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM2_FULL_REMAP: Full pin remapping

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM2_PARTIAL_REMAP_1: Partial pin remapping #1

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM2_PARTIAL_REMAP_2: Partial pin remapping #2

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.57.10 Choice: TIM3 Alternate Pin Mappings

  • Default: STM32_TIM3_NO_REMAP
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_TIM3
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM3_NO_REMAP: No pin remapping

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_TIM10
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_TIM11
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.57.15 CONFIG_STM32_TIM12_REMAP: TIM12 Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_TIM12
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.57.16 CONFIG_STM32_TIM13_REMAP: TIM13 Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_TIM13
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.57.17 CONFIG_STM32_TIM14_REMAP: TIM14 Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_TIM14
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.57.18 CONFIG_STM32_TIM15_REMAP: TIM15 Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_TIM15
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.57.19 CONFIG_STM32_TIM16_REMAP: TIM16 Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_TIM16
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.57.20 CONFIG_STM32_TIM17_REMAP: TIM17 Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_TIM17
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.57.21 CONFIG_STM32_USART1_REMAP: USART1 Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_USART1
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.57.22 CONFIG_STM32_USART2_REMAP: USART2 Alternate Pin Mapping

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_USART2
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.57.23 Choice: USART3 Alternate Pin Mappings

  • Default: STM32_USART3_NO_REMAP
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_USART3
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_STM32_USART3_NO_REMAP: No pin remapping

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_USART3_FULL_REMAP: Full pin remapping

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_USART3_PARTIAL_REMAP: Partial pin remapping

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.58 CONFIG_STM32_FLASH_PREFETCH: Enable FLASH Pre-fetch

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default Values:
    • Default: y

      Dependency: CONFIG_STM32_STM32F427 || CONFIG_STM32_STM32F429

    • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F207 || CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Enable FLASH prefetch and F2 and F4 parts (FLASH pre-fetch is always enabled on F1 parts). Some early revisions of F4 parts do not support FLASH pre-fetch properly and enabling this option may interfere with ADC accuracy.

1.2.59 Choice: JTAG Configuration

  • Default: STM32_JTAG_DISABLE
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    • JTAG Enable settings (by default JTAG-DP and SW-DP are disabled)

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_STM32_JTAG_DISABLE: Disable all JTAG clocking

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_JTAG_FULL_ENABLE: Enable full SWJ (JTAG-DP + SW-DP)

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_JTAG_NOJNTRST_ENABLE: Enable full SWJ (JTAG-DP + SW-DP) but without JNTRST

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_JTAG_SW_ENABLE: Set JTAG-DP disabled and SW-DP enabled

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.60 CONFIG_STM32_DISABLE_IDLE_SLEEP_DURING_DEBUG: Disable IDLE Sleep (WFI) in debug mode

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    In debug configuration, disables the WFI instruction in the IDLE loop to prevent the JTAG from disconnecting. With some JTAG debuggers, such as the ST-LINK2 with OpenOCD, if the ARM is put to sleep via the WFI instruction, the debugger will disconnect, terminating the debug session.

1.2.61 CONFIG_STM32_FORCEPOWER: Force power

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Timer and I2C devices may need to the following to force power to be applied unconditionally at power up. (Otherwise, the device is powered when it is initialized).

1.2.62 CONFIG_ARCH_BOARD_STM32_CUSTOM_CLOCKCONFIG: Custom clock configuration

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Enables special, board-specific STM32 clock configuration.

1.2.63 CONFIG_STM32_CCMEXCLUDE: Exclude CCM SRAM from the heap

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y

    Dependency: CONFIG_ARCH_DMA || CONFIG_ELF

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_HAVE_CCM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Exclude CCM SRAM from the HEAP because (1) it cannot be used for DMA and (2) it appears to be impossible to execute ELF modules from CCM RAM.

1.2.64 CONFIG_STM32_CCM_PROCFS: CCM PROCFS support

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_CCMEXCLUDE && CONFIG_FS_PROCFS
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Select to build in support for /proc/ccm. Reading from /proc/ccm will provide statistics about CCM memory use similar to what you would get from mallinfo() for the user heap.

1.2.65 CONFIG_STM32_DMACAPABLE: Workaround non-DMA capable memory

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default Values:
    • Default: y

      Dependency: CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX && !CONFIG_STM32_CCMEXCLUDE

    • Default: n

      Dependency: !CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX || CONFIG_STM32_CCMEXCLUDE

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_ARCH_DMA
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    This option enables the DMA interface stm32_dmacapable that can be used to check if it is possible to do DMA from the selected address. Drivers then may use this information to determine if they should attempt the DMA or fall back to a different transfer method.

1.2.66 CONFIG_STM32_FSMC_SRAM: External SRAM on FSMC

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_HEAP2
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_FSMC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    In addition to internal SRAM, SRAM may also be available through the FSMC.

1.2.67 CONFIG_STM32_TIM1_PWM: TIM1 PWM

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_PWM_PULSECOUNT
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM1
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Reserve timer 1 for use by PWM

    Timer devices may be used for different purposes. One special purpose is to generate modulated outputs for such things as motor control. If STM32_TIM1 is defined then THIS following may also be defined to indicate that the timer is intended to be used for pulsed output modulation.

1.2.68 CONFIG_STM32_TIM1_CHANNEL: TIM1 PWM Output Channel

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 1
  • Range: 1 - 4
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM1_PWM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    If TIM1 is enabled for PWM usage, you also need specifies the timer output channel {1,..,4}

1.2.69 CONFIG_STM32_TIM2_PWM: TIM2 PWM

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_PWM_PULSECOUNT
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM2
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Reserve timer 2 for use by PWM

    Timer devices may be used for different purposes. One special purpose is to generate modulated outputs for such things as motor control. If STM32_TIM2 is defined then THIS following may also be defined to indicate that the timer is intended to be used for pulsed output modulation.

1.2.70 CONFIG_STM32_TIM2_CHANNEL: TIM2 PWM Output Channel

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 1
  • Range: 1 - 4
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM2_PWM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    If TIM2 is enabled for PWM usage, you also need specifies the timer output channel {1,..,4}

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n

    Timer devices may be used for different purposes. One special purpose is to generate modulated outputs for such things as motor control. If STM32_TIM13 is defined then THIS following may also be defined to indicate that the timer is intended to be used for pulsed output modulation.

1.2.88 CONFIG_STM32_TIM13_CHANNEL: TIM13 PWM Output Channel

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 1
  • Range: 1 - 4
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM13_PWM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    If TIM13 is enabled for PWM usage, you also need specifies the timer output channel {1,..,4}

1.2.89 CONFIG_STM32_TIM14_PWM: TIM14 PWM

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Selects: CONFIG_ARCH_HAVE_PWM_PULSECOUNT
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM14
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Reserve timer 14 for use by PWM

    Timer devices may be used for different purposes. One special purpose is to generate modulated outputs for such things as motor control. If STM32_TIM14 is defined then THIS following may also be defined to indicate that the timer is intended to be used for pulsed output modulation.

1.2.90 CONFIG_STM32_TIM14_CHANNEL: TIM14 PWM Output Channel

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 1
  • Range: 1 - 4
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM14_PWM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    If TIM14 is enabled for PWM usage, you also need specifies the timer output channel {1,..,4}

1.2.91 CONFIG_STM32_TIM15_PWM: TIM15 PWM

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM15
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Reserve timer 15 for use by PWM

    Timer devices may be used for different purposes. One special purpose is to generate modulated outputs for such things as motor control. If STM32_TIM15 is defined then THIS following may also be defined to indicate that the timer is intended to be used for pulsed output modulation.

1.2.92 CONFIG_STM32_TIM15_CHANNEL: TIM15 PWM Output Channel

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 1
  • Range: 1 - 2
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM15_PWM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    If TIM15 is enabled for PWM usage, you also need specifies the timer output channel {1,2}

1.2.93 CONFIG_STM32_TIM16_PWM: TIM16 PWM

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM16
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Reserve timer 16 for use by PWM

    Timer devices may be used for different purposes. One special purpose is to generate modulated outputs for such things as motor control. If STM32_TIM16 is defined then THIS following may also be defined to indicate that the timer is intended to be used for pulsed output modulation.

1.2.94 CONFIG_STM32_TIM16_CHANNEL: TIM16 PWM Output Channel

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 1
  • Range: 1 - 1
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM16_PWM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    If TIM16 is enabled for PWM usage, you also need specifies the timer output channel {1}

1.2.95 CONFIG_STM32_TIM17_PWM: TIM17 PWM

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM17
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Reserve timer 17 for use by PWM

    Timer devices may be used for different purposes. One special purpose is to generate modulated outputs for such things as motor control. If STM32_TIM17 is defined then THIS following may also be defined to indicate that the timer is intended to be used for pulsed output modulation.

1.2.96 CONFIG_STM32_TIM17_CHANNEL: TIM17 PWM Output Channel

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 1
  • Range: 1 - 1
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM17_PWM
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    If TIM17 is enabled for PWM usage, you also need specifies the timer output channel {1}

1.2.97 CONFIG_STM32_TIM1_ADC: TIM1 ADC

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM1 && CONFIG_STM32_ADC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Reserve timer 1 for use by ADC

    Timer devices may be used for different purposes. If STM32_TIM1 is defined then the following may also be defined to indicate that the timer is intended to be used for ADC conversion. Note that ADC usage requires two definition: Not only do you have to assign the timer for used by the ADC, but then you also have to configure which ADC channel it is assigned to.

1.2.98 Choice: Select TIM1 ADC channel

  • Default: STM32_TIM1_ADC1
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM1_ADC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM1_ADC1: TIM1 ADC channel 1

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_HAVE_ADC1_TIMER
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ADC1
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

      Reserve TIM1 to trigger ADC1

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM1_ADC2: TIM1 ADC channel 2

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_HAVE_ADC2_TIMER
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ADC2
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

      Reserve TIM1 to trigger ADC2

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM1_ADC3: TIM1 ADC channel 3

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_HAVE_ADC3_TIMER
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ADC3
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

      Reserve TIM1 to trigger ADC3

1.2.99 CONFIG_STM32_TIM2_ADC: TIM2 ADC

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM2 && CONFIG_STM32_ADC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Reserve timer 1 for use by ADC

    Timer devices may be used for different purposes. If STM32_TIM2 is defined then the following may also be defined to indicate that the timer is intended to be used for ADC conversion. Note that ADC usage requires two definition: Not only do you have to assign the timer for used by the ADC, but then you also have to configure which ADC channel it is assigned to.

1.2.100 Choice: Select TIM2 ADC channel

  • Default: STM32_TIM2_ADC1
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM2_ADC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM2_ADC1: TIM2 ADC channel 1

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_HAVE_ADC1_TIMER
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ADC1
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

      Reserve TIM2 to trigger ADC1

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM2_ADC2: TIM2 ADC channel 2

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_HAVE_ADC2_TIMER
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ADC2
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

      Reserve TIM2 to trigger ADC2

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM2_ADC3: TIM2 ADC channel 3

    • Type: Boolean
    • Selects: CONFIG_HAVE_ADC3_TIMER
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ADC3
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

      Reserve TIM2 to trigger ADC3

1.2.109 CONFIG_STM32_ADC1_SAMPLE_FREQUENCY: ADC1 Sampling Frequency

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 100
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_HAVE_ADC1_TIMER
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    ADC1 sampling frequency. Default: 100Hz

1.2.110 CONFIG_STM32_ADC1_TIMTRIG: ADC1 Timer Trigger

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 0
  • Range: 0 - 4
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_HAVE_ADC1_TIMER
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Values 0:CC1 1:CC2 2:CC3 3:CC4 4:TRGO

1.2.111 CONFIG_STM32_ADC2_SAMPLE_FREQUENCY: ADC2 Sampling Frequency

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 100
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_HAVE_ADC2_TIMER
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    ADC2 sampling frequency. Default: 100Hz

1.2.112 CONFIG_STM32_ADC2_TIMTRIG: ADC2 Timer Trigger

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 0
  • Range: 0 - 4
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_HAVE_ADC2_TIMER
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Values 0:CC1 1:CC2 2:CC3 3:CC4 4:TRGO

1.2.113 CONFIG_STM32_ADC3_SAMPLE_FREQUENCY: ADC3 Sampling Frequency

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 100
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_HAVE_ADC3_TIMER
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    ADC3 sampling frequency. Default: 100Hz

1.2.114 CONFIG_STM32_ADC3_TIMTRIG: ADC3 Timer Trigger

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 0

    Values 0:CC1 1:CC2 2:CC3 3:CC4 4:TRGO

  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM7 && CONFIG_STM32_DAC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Reserve timer 7 for use by DAC

    Timer devices may be used for different purposes. If STM32_TIM7 is defined then the following may also be defined to indicate that the timer is intended to be used for DAC conversion. Note that DAC usage requires two definition: Not only do you have to assign the timer for used by the DAC, but then you also have to configure which DAC channel it is assigned to.

1.2.128 Choice: Select TIM7 DAC channel

  • Default: STM32_TIM7_DAC1
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM7_DAC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM7_DAC1: TIM7 DAC channel 1

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

      Reserve TIM7 to trigger DAC1

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM7_DAC2: TIM7 DAC channel 2

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

      Reserve TIM7 to trigger DAC2

1.2.129 CONFIG_STM32_TIM8_DAC: TIM8 DAC

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM8 && CONFIG_STM32_DAC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Reserve timer 8 for use by DAC

    Timer devices may be used for different purposes. If STM32_TIM8 is defined then the following may also be defined to indicate that the timer is intended to be used for DAC conversion. Note that DAC usage requires two definition: Not only do you have to assign the timer for used by the DAC, but then you also have to configure which DAC channel it is assigned to.

1.2.130 Choice: Select TIM8 DAC channel

  • Default: STM32_TIM8_DAC1
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM8_DAC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM8_DAC1: TIM8 DAC channel 1

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

      Reserve TIM8 to trigger DAC1

    CONFIG_STM32_TIM8_DAC2: TIM8 DAC channel 2

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

      Reserve TIM8 to trigger DAC2

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM9 && CONFIG_STM32_DAC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

  • Default: STM32_TIM9_DAC1
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_TIM9_DAC

1.2.143 Menu: DAC Configuration

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_DAC1 || CONFIG_STM32_DAC2
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.143.1 CONFIG_STM32_DAC1_DMA: DAC1 DMA

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_DAC1
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    If DMA is selected, then a timer and output frequency must also be provided to support the DMA transfer. The DMA transfer could be supported by and EXTI trigger, but this feature is not currently supported by the driver.

1.2.143.2 CONFIG_STM32_DAC1_TIMER: DAC1 timer

  • Type: Integer
  • Range: 2 - 7
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_DAC1_DMA
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.143.3 CONFIG_STM32_DAC1_TIMER_FREQUENCY: DAC1 timer frequency

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 0
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_DAC1_DMA
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.143.4 CONFIG_STM32_DAC2_DMA: DAC2 DMA

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_DAC2
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    If DMA is selected, then a timer and output frequency must also be provided to support the DMA transfer. The DMA transfer could be supported by and EXTI trigger, but this feature is not currently supported by the driver.

1.2.143.5 CONFIG_STM32_DAC2_TIMER: DAC2 timer

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 0
  • Range: 2 - 7
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_DAC2_DMA
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.143.6 CONFIG_STM32_DAC2_TIMER_FREQUENCY: DAC2 timer frequency

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 0
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_DAC2_DMA
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.143.7 CONFIG_STM32_DAC_DMA_BUFFER_SIZE: DAC DMA buffer size

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 256
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.144 Menu: U[S]ART Configuration

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_USART
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.144.1 CONFIG_USART1_RS485: RS-485 on USART1

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_USART1
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Enable RS-485 interface on USART1. Your board config will have to provide GPIO_USART1_RS485_DIR pin definition. Currently it cannot be used with USART1_RXDMA.

1.2.144.2 CONFIG_USART1_RS485_DIR_POLARITY: USART1 RS-485 DIR pin polarity

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 1
  • Range: 0 - 1
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_USART1_RS485
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Polarity of DIR pin for RS-485 on USART1. Set to state on DIR pin which enables TX (0 - low / nTXEN, 1 - high / TXEN).

1.2.144.3 CONFIG_USART1_RXDMA: USART1 Rx DMA

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_USART1 && (((CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX || CONFIG_STM32_STM32L15XX) && CONFIG_STM32_DMA1) || (!CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX && CONFIG_STM32_DMA2))
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    In high data rate usage, Rx DMA may eliminate Rx overrun errors

1.2.144.4 CONFIG_USART2_RS485: RS-485 on USART2

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_USART2
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Enable RS-485 interface on USART2. Your board config will have to provide GPIO_USART2_RS485_DIR pin definition. Currently it cannot be used with USART2_RXDMA.

1.2.144.5 CONFIG_USART2_RS485_DIR_POLARITY: USART2 RS-485 DIR pin polarity

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 1
  • Range: 0 - 1
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_USART2_RS485
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Polarity of DIR pin for RS-485 on USART2. Set to state on DIR pin which enables TX (0 - low / nTXEN, 1 - high / TXEN).

1.2.144.6 CONFIG_USART2_RXDMA: USART2 Rx DMA

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_USART2 && CONFIG_STM32_DMA1
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    In high data rate usage, Rx DMA may eliminate Rx overrun errors

1.2.144.7 CONFIG_USART3_RS485: RS-485 on USART3

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_USART3
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Enable RS-485 interface on USART3. Your board config will have to provide GPIO_USART3_RS485_DIR pin definition. Currently it cannot be used with USART3_RXDMA.

1.2.144.8 CONFIG_USART3_RS485_DIR_POLARITY: USART3 RS-485 DIR pin polarity

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 1
  • Range: 0 - 1
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_USART3_RS485
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Polarity of DIR pin for RS-485 on USART3. Set to state on DIR pin which enables TX (0 - low / nTXEN, 1 - high / TXEN).

1.2.144.9 CONFIG_USART3_RXDMA: USART3 Rx DMA

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_USART3 && CONFIG_STM32_DMA1
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    In high data rate usage, Rx DMA may eliminate Rx overrun errors

1.2.144.10 CONFIG_UART4_RS485: RS-485 on UART4

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_UART4
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Enable RS-485 interface on UART4. Your board config will have to provide GPIO_UART4_RS485_DIR pin definition. Currently it cannot be used with UART4_RXDMA.

1.2.144.11 CONFIG_UART4_RS485_DIR_POLARITY: UART4 RS-485 DIR pin polarity

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 1
  • Range: 0 - 1
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_UART4_RS485
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Polarity of DIR pin for RS-485 on UART4. Set to state on DIR pin which enables TX (0 - low / nTXEN, 1 - high / TXEN).

1.2.144.12 CONFIG_UART4_RXDMA: UART4 Rx DMA

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_UART4 && CONFIG_STM32_DMA1
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    In high data rate usage, Rx DMA may eliminate Rx overrun errors

1.2.144.13 CONFIG_UART5_RS485: RS-485 on UART5

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_UART5
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Enable RS-485 interface on UART5. Your board config will have to provide GPIO_UART5_RS485_DIR pin definition. Currently it cannot be used with UART5_RXDMA.

1.2.144.14 CONFIG_UART5_RS485_DIR_POLARITY: UART5 RS-485 DIR pin polarity

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 1
  • Range: 0 - 1
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_UART5_RS485
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Polarity of DIR pin for RS-485 on UART5. Set to state on DIR pin which enables TX (0 - low / nTXEN, 1 - high / TXEN).

1.2.144.15 CONFIG_UART5_RXDMA: UART5 Rx DMA

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_UART5 && CONFIG_STM32_DMA1
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    In high data rate usage, Rx DMA may eliminate Rx overrun errors

1.2.144.16 CONFIG_USART6_RS485: RS-485 on USART6

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_USART6
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Enable RS-485 interface on USART6. Your board config will have to provide GPIO_USART6_RS485_DIR pin definition. Currently it cannot be used with USART6_RXDMA.

1.2.144.17 CONFIG_USART6_RS485_DIR_POLARITY: USART6 RS-485 DIR pin polarity

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 1
  • Range: 0 - 1
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_USART6_RS485
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Polarity of DIR pin for RS-485 on USART6. Set to state on DIR pin which enables TX (0 - low / nTXEN, 1 - high / TXEN).

1.2.144.18 CONFIG_USART6_RXDMA: USART6 Rx DMA

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_USART6 && CONFIG_STM32_DMA2
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    In high data rate usage, Rx DMA may eliminate Rx overrun errors

1.2.144.19 CONFIG_UART7_RS485: RS-485 on UART7

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_UART7
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Enable RS-485 interface on UART7. Your board config will have to provide GPIO_UART7_RS485_DIR pin definition. Currently it cannot be used with UART7_RXDMA.

1.2.144.20 CONFIG_UART7_RS485_DIR_POLARITY: UART7 RS-485 DIR pin polarity

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 1
  • Range: 0 - 1
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_UART7_RS485
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Polarity of DIR pin for RS-485 on UART7. Set to state on DIR pin which enables TX (0 - low / nTXEN, 1 - high / TXEN).

1.2.144.21 CONFIG_UART7_RXDMA: UART7 Rx DMA

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_UART7 && CONFIG_STM32_DMA2
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    In high data rate usage, Rx DMA may eliminate Rx overrun errors

1.2.144.22 CONFIG_UART8_RS485: RS-485 on UART8

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_UART8
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Enable RS-485 interface on UART8. Your board config will have to provide GPIO_UART8_RS485_DIR pin definition. Currently it cannot be used with UART8_RXDMA.

1.2.144.23 CONFIG_UART8_RS485_DIR_POLARITY: UART8 RS-485 DIR pin polarity

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 1
  • Range: 0 - 1
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_UART8_RS485
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Polarity of DIR pin for RS-485 on UART8. Set to state on DIR pin which enables TX (0 - low / nTXEN, 1 - high / TXEN).

1.2.144.24 CONFIG_UART8_RXDMA: UART8 Rx DMA

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_UART8 && CONFIG_STM32_DMA2
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    In high data rate usage, Rx DMA may eliminate Rx overrun errors

1.2.144.25 CONFIG_SERIAL_DISABLE_REORDERING: Disable reordering of ttySx devices.

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_USART1 || CONFIG_STM32_USART2 || CONFIG_STM32_USART3 || CONFIG_STM32_UART4 || CONFIG_STM32_UART5 || CONFIG_STM32_USART6 || CONFIG_STM32_UART7 || CONFIG_STM32_UART8
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    TinyAra per default reorders the serial ports (/dev/ttySx) so that the console is always on /dev/ttyS0. If more than one UART is in use this can, however, have the side-effect that all port mappings (hardware USART1 -> /dev/ttyS0) change if the console is moved to another UART. This is in particular relevant if a project uses the USB console in some configs and a serial console in other configs, but does not want the side effect of having all serial port names change when just the console is moved from serial to USB.

1.2.144.26 CONFIG_STM32_FLOWCONTROL_BROKEN: Use Software UART RTS flow control

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_USART
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Enable UART RTS flow control using Software. Because STM Current STM32 have broken HW based RTS behavior (they assert nRTS after every byte received) Enable this setting workaround this issue by useing software based management of RTS

1.2.145 CONFIG_STM32_USART_SINGLEWIRE: Single Wire Support

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_USART
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Enable single wire UART support. The option enables support for the TIOCSSINGLEWIRE ioctl in the STM32 serial driver.

1.2.146 Menu: SPI Configuration

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_SPI
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.146.1 CONFIG_STM32_SPI_INTERRUPTS: Interrupt driver SPI

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Select to enable interrupt driven SPI support. Non-interrupt-driven, poll-waiting is recommended if the interrupt rate would be to high in the interrupt driven case.

1.2.146.2 CONFIG_STM32_SPI_DMA: SPI DMA

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Use DMA to improve SPI transfer performance. Cannot be used with STM32_SPI_INTERRUPT.

1.2.147 Menu: I2C Configuration

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_I2C
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.147.1 CONFIG_STM32_I2C_ALT: Alternate I2C implementation

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default Values:
    • Default: n

      Dependency: !CONFIG_STM32_PERFORMANCELINE

    • Default: y

      Dependency: CONFIG_STM32_PERFORMANCELINE

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , !CONFIG_STM32_STM32F30XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    This selection enables an alternative I2C driver. This alternate driver implements some rather complex workarounds for errata against the STM32 F103 "Performance Line". This selection is an option because: (1) It has not yet been fully verified and (2) It is not certain that he scope of this workaround is needed only for the F103.

1.2.147.2 CONFIG_STM32_I2C_DYNTIMEO: Use dynamic timeouts

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_I2C
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.147.3 CONFIG_STM32_I2C_DYNTIMEO_USECPERBYTE: Timeout Microseconds per Byte

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 500
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_I2C_DYNTIMEO
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.147.4 CONFIG_STM32_I2C_DYNTIMEO_STARTSTOP: Timeout for Start/Stop (Milliseconds)

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 1000
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_I2C_DYNTIMEO
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.147.5 CONFIG_STM32_I2CTIMEOSEC: Timeout seconds

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 0
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_I2C
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.147.6 CONFIG_STM32_I2CTIMEOMS: Timeout Milliseconds

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 500
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_I2C && !CONFIG_STM32_I2C_DYNTIMEO
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.147.7 CONFIG_STM32_I2CTIMEOTICKS: Timeout for Done and Stop (ticks)

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 500
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_I2C && !CONFIG_STM32_I2C_DYNTIMEO
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.147.8 CONFIG_STM32_I2C_DUTY16_9: Frequency with Tlow/Thigh = 16/9

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_I2C
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.148 Menu: SDIO Configuration

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_SDIO
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.148.1 CONFIG_SDIO_DMA: Support DMA data transfers

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y

    Dependency: CONFIG_STM32_DMA2

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_DMA2
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Support DMA data transfers. Requires STM32_SDIO and config STM32_DMA2.

1.2.148.2 CONFIG_SDIO_PRI: SDIO interrupt priority

  • Type: Hexadecimal
  • Default: 128
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_ARCH_IRQPRIO && CONFIG_EXPERIMENTAL
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Select SDIO interrupt priority. Default: 128.

1.2.148.3 CONFIG_SDIO_DMAPRIO: SDIO DMA priority

  • Type: Hexadecimal
  • Default Values:
    • Default: 0x00001000

      Dependency: CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX

    • Default: 0x00010000

      Dependency: !CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Select SDIO DMA prority.

    For STM32 F1 family, options are: 0x00000000 low, 0x00001000 medium, 0x00002000 high, 0x00003000 very high. Default: medium.

    For other STM32's, options are: 0x00000000 low, 0x00010000 medium, 0x00020000 high, 0x00030000 very high. Default: medium.

1.2.148.4 CONFIG_SDIO_WIDTH_D1_ONLY: Use D1 only

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Select 1-bit transfer mode. Default: 4-bit transfer mode.

1.2.149 Choice: RTC clock source

  • Default: RTC_LSECLOCK
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_RTC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_RTC_LSECLOCK: LSE clock

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

      Drive the RTC with the LSE clock

    CONFIG_RTC_LSICLOCK: LSI clock

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , !CONFIG_STM32_STM32L15XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

      Drive the RTC with the LSI clock

    CONFIG_RTC_HSECLOCK: HSE clock

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , !CONFIG_STM32_STM32L15XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

      Drive the RTC with the HSE clock, divided down to 1MHz.

1.2.150 Menu: Ethernet MAC configuration

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.150.1 CONFIG_STM32_PHYADDR: PHY address

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 1
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    The 5-bit address of the PHY on the board. Default: 1

1.2.150.2 CONFIG_STM32_PHYINIT: Board-specific PHY Initialization

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Some boards require specialized initialization of the PHY before it can be used. This may include such things as configuring GPIOs, resetting the PHY, etc. If STM32_PHYINIT is defined in the configuration then the board specific logic must provide stm32_phyinitialize(); The STM32 Ethernet driver will call this function one time before it first uses the PHY.

1.2.150.3 CONFIG_STM32_MII: Use MII interface

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Support Ethernet MII interface.

1.2.150.4 Choice: MII clock configuration

  • Default Values:
    • Default: STM32_MII_MCO

      Dependency: CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX

    • Default: STM32_MII_MCO1

      Dependency: CONFIG_STM32_STM32F207 || CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC , CONFIG_STM32_MII
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_STM32_MII_MCO: Use MC0 as MII clock

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

      Use MCO to clock the MII interface. Default: Use MC0

    CONFIG_STM32_MII_MCO1: Use MC01 as MII clock

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC , (CONFIG_STM32_STM32F207 || CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX)
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

      Use MCO1 to clock the MII interface. Default: Use MC01

    CONFIG_STM32_MII_MCO2: Use MC02 as MII clock

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC , (CONFIG_STM32_STM32F207 || CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX)
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

      Use MCO2 to clock the MII interface. Default: Use MC01

    CONFIG_STM32_MII_EXTCLK: External MII clock

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

      Clocking is provided by external logic. Don't use MCO for MII clock. Default: Use MC0[1]

1.2.150.5 CONFIG_STM32_AUTONEG: Use autonegotiation

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Use PHY autonegotiation to determine speed and mode

1.2.150.6 CONFIG_STM32_ETHFD: Full duplex

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC , !CONFIG_STM32_AUTONEG
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    If STM32_AUTONEG is not defined, then this may be defined to select full duplex mode. Default: half-duplex

1.2.150.7 CONFIG_STM32_ETH100MBPS: 100 Mbps

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC , !CONFIG_STM32_AUTONEG
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    If STM32_AUTONEG is not defined, then this may be defined to select 100 MBps speed. Default: 10 Mbps

1.2.150.8 CONFIG_STM32_PHYSR: PHY Status Register Address (decimal)

  • Type: Integer
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC , CONFIG_STM32_AUTONEG
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    This must be provided if STM32_AUTONEG is defined. The PHY status register address may diff from PHY to PHY. This configuration sets the address of the PHY status register.

1.2.150.9 CONFIG_STM32_PHYSR_ALTCONFIG: PHY Status Alternate Bit Layout

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC , CONFIG_STM32_AUTONEG
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Different PHYs present speed and mode information in different ways. Some will present separate information for speed and mode (this is the default). Those PHYs, for example, may provide a 10/100 Mbps indication and a separate full/half duplex indication. This options selects an alternative representation where speed and mode information are combined. This might mean, for example, separate bits for 10HD, 100HD, 10FD and 100FD.

1.2.150.10 CONFIG_STM32_PHYSR_SPEED: PHY Speed Mask

  • Type: Hexadecimal
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC , CONFIG_STM32_AUTONEG && !CONFIG_STM32_PHYSR_ALTCONFIG
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    This must be provided if STM32_AUTONEG is defined. This provides bit mask for isolating the 10 or 100MBps speed indication.

1.2.150.11 CONFIG_STM32_PHYSR_100MBPS: PHY 100Mbps Speed Value

  • Type: Hexadecimal
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC , CONFIG_STM32_AUTONEG && !CONFIG_STM32_PHYSR_ALTCONFIG
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    This must be provided if STM32_AUTONEG is defined. This provides the value of the speed bit(s) indicating 100MBps speed.

1.2.150.12 CONFIG_STM32_PHYSR_MODE: PHY Mode Mask

  • Type: Hexadecimal
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC , CONFIG_STM32_AUTONEG && !CONFIG_STM32_PHYSR_ALTCONFIG
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    This must be provided if STM32_AUTONEG is defined. This provide bit mask for isolating the full or half duplex mode bits.

1.2.150.13 CONFIG_STM32_PHYSR_FULLDUPLEX: PHY Full Duplex Mode Value

  • Type: Hexadecimal
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC , CONFIG_STM32_AUTONEG && !CONFIG_STM32_PHYSR_ALTCONFIG
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    This must be provided if STM32_AUTONEG is defined. This provides the value of the mode bits indicating full duplex mode.

1.2.150.14 CONFIG_STM32_PHYSR_ALTMODE: PHY Mode Mask

  • Type: Hexadecimal
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC , CONFIG_STM32_AUTONEG && CONFIG_STM32_PHYSR_ALTCONFIG
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    This must be provided if STM32_AUTONEG is defined. This provide bit mask for isolating the speed and full/half duplex mode bits.

1.2.150.15 CONFIG_STM32_PHYSR_10HD: 10MBase-T Half Duplex Value

  • Type: Hexadecimal
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC , CONFIG_STM32_AUTONEG && CONFIG_STM32_PHYSR_ALTCONFIG
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    This must be provided if STM32_AUTONEG is defined. This is the value under the bit mask that represents the 10Mbps, half duplex setting.

1.2.150.16 CONFIG_STM32_PHYSR_100HD: 100Base-T Half Duplex Value

  • Type: Hexadecimal
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC , CONFIG_STM32_AUTONEG && CONFIG_STM32_PHYSR_ALTCONFIG
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    This must be provided if STM32_AUTONEG is defined. This is the value under the bit mask that represents the 100Mbps, half duplex setting.

1.2.150.17 CONFIG_STM32_PHYSR_10FD: 10Base-T Full Duplex Value

  • Type: Hexadecimal
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC , CONFIG_STM32_AUTONEG && CONFIG_STM32_PHYSR_ALTCONFIG
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    This must be provided if STM32_AUTONEG is defined. This is the value under the bit mask that represents the 10Mbps, full duplex setting.

1.2.150.18 CONFIG_STM32_PHYSR_100FD: 100Base-T Full Duplex Value

  • Type: Hexadecimal
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC , CONFIG_STM32_AUTONEG && CONFIG_STM32_PHYSR_ALTCONFIG
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    This must be provided if STM32_AUTONEG is defined. This is the value under the bit mask that represents the 100Mbps, full duplex setting.

1.2.150.19 CONFIG_STM32_ETH_PTP: Precision Time Protocol (PTP)

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Precision Time Protocol (PTP). Not supported but some hooks are indicated with this condition.

1.2.150.20 Choice: RMII clock configuration

  • Default Values:
    • Default: STM32_RMII_MCO

      Dependency: CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX

    • Default: STM32_RMII_MCO1

      Dependency: CONFIG_STM32_STM32F207 || CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC , CONFIG_STM32_RMII
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_STM32_RMII_MCO: Use MC0 as RMII clock

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC , CONFIG_STM32_STM32F10XX
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

      Use MCO to clock the RMII interface. Default: Use MC0

    CONFIG_STM32_RMII_MCO1: Use MC01 as RMII clock

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC , (CONFIG_STM32_STM32F207 || CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX)
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

      Use MCO1 to clock the RMII interface. Default: Use MC01

    CONFIG_STM32_RMII_MCO2: Use MC02 as RMII clock

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC , (CONFIG_STM32_STM32F207 || CONFIG_STM32_STM32F40XX)
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

      Use MCO2 to clock the RMII interface. Default: Use MC01

    CONFIG_STM32_RMII_EXTCLK: External RMII clock

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

      Clocking is provided by external logic. Don't use MCO for RMII clock. Default: Use MC0[1]

1.2.150.21 CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC_REGDEBUG: Register-Level Debug

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_ETHMAC , CONFIG_DEBUG
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Enable very low-level register access debug. Depends on DEBUG.

1.2.151 Menu: USB FS Host Configuration

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.151.1 CONFIG_STM32_OTGFS_RXFIFO_SIZE: Rx Packet Size

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 128
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_USBHOST && CONFIG_STM32_OTGFS
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Size of the RX FIFO in 32-bit words. Default 128 (512 bytes)

1.2.151.2 CONFIG_STM32_OTGFS_NPTXFIFO_SIZE: Non-periodic Tx FIFO Size

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 96
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_USBHOST && CONFIG_STM32_OTGFS
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Size of the non-periodic Tx FIFO in 32-bit words. Default 96 (384 bytes)

1.2.151.3 CONFIG_STM32_OTGFS_PTXFIFO_SIZE: Periodic Tx FIFO size

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 128
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_USBHOST && CONFIG_STM32_OTGFS
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Size of the periodic Tx FIFO in 32-bit words. Default 96 (384 bytes)

1.2.151.4 CONFIG_STM32_OTGFS_DESCSIZE: Descriptor Size

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 128
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_USBHOST && CONFIG_STM32_OTGFS
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Maximum size to allocate for descriptor memory descriptor. Default: 128

1.2.151.5 CONFIG_STM32_OTGFS_SOFINTR: Enable SOF interrupts

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_USBHOST && CONFIG_STM32_OTGFS
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Enable SOF interrupts. Why would you ever want to do that?

1.2.152 Menu: USB HS Host Configuration

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.152.1 CONFIG_STM32_OTGHS_RXFIFO_SIZE: Rx Packet Size

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 128
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_USBHOST && CONFIG_STM32_OTGHS
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Size of the RX FIFO in 32-bit words. Default 128 (512 bytes)

1.2.152.2 CONFIG_STM32_OTGHS_NPTXFIFO_SIZE: Non-periodic Tx FIFO Size

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 96
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_USBHOST && CONFIG_STM32_OTGHS
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Size of the non-periodic Tx FIFO in 32-bit words. Default 96 (384 bytes)

1.2.152.3 CONFIG_STM32_OTGHS_PTXFIFO_SIZE: Periodic Tx FIFO size

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 128
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_USBHOST && CONFIG_STM32_OTGHS
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Size of the periodic Tx FIFO in 32-bit words. Default 96 (384 bytes)

1.2.152.4 CONFIG_STM32_OTGHS_DESCSIZE: Descriptor Size

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 128
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_USBHOST && CONFIG_STM32_OTGHS
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Maximum size to allocate for descriptor memory descriptor. Default: 128

1.2.152.5 CONFIG_STM32_OTGHS_SOFINTR: Enable SOF interrupts

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_USBHOST && CONFIG_STM32_OTGHS
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Enable SOF interrupts. Why would you ever want to do that?

1.2.153 Menu: USB Host Debug Configuration

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.153.1 CONFIG_STM32_USBHOST_REGDEBUG: Register-Level Debug

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_USBHOST && (CONFIG_STM32_OTGFS || CONFIG_STM32_OTGHS)
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Enable very low-level register access debug. Depends on DEBUG.

1.2.153.2 CONFIG_STM32_USBHOST_PKTDUMP: Packet Dump Debug

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_USBHOST && (CONFIG_STM32_OTGFS || CONFIG_STM32_OTGHS)
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Dump all incoming and outgoing USB packets. Depends on DEBUG.

1.2.154 CONFIG_STM32_USB_ITRMP: Re-map USB interrupt

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default Values:
    • Default: n

      Dependency: !CONFIG_STM32_CAN1

    • Default: y

      Dependency: CONFIG_STM32_CAN1

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_USB && CONFIG_STM32_STM32F30XX
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    The legacy USB in the F1 series shared interrupt lines with USB device and CAN1. In the F3 series, a hardware options was added to either retain the legacy F1 behavior or to map the USB interupts to there own dedicated vectors. The option is available only for the F3 family and selects the use of the dedicated USB interrupts.

1.2.155 Menu: CAN driver configuration

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_CAN1 || CONFIG_STM32_CAN2
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.155.1 CONFIG_CAN1_BAUD: CAN1 BAUD

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 250000
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_CAN1
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CAN1 BAUD rate. Required if STM32_CAN1 is defined.

1.2.155.2 CONFIG_CAN2_BAUD: CAN2 BAUD

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 250000
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_CAN2
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CAN2 BAUD rate. Required if STM32_CAN2 is defined.

1.2.155.3 CONFIG_CAN_TSEG1: TSEG1 quanta

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 6
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    The number of CAN time quanta in segment 1. Default: 6

1.2.155.4 CONFIG_CAN_TSEG2: TSEG2 quanta

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 7
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    The number of CAN time quanta in segment 2. Default: 7

1.2.156 Menu: LTDC Configuration

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.156.1 CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_INTERFACE: LTDC interface support

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Enable the ltdc interface to support ltdc layer control.

1.2.156.2 CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_BACKLIGHT: Backlight support

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.156.3 CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_DEFBACKLIGHT: Default backlight level

  • Type: Hexadecimal
  • Default: 0xf0
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.156.4 CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_BACKCOLOR: Background color

  • Type: Hexadecimal
  • Default: 0x0
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    This is the background color that will be used as the LTDC background layer color. It is an RGB888 format value.

1.2.156.5 CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_DITHER: Dither support

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.156.6 CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_DITHER_RED: Dither red width

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 2
  • Range: 0 - 7
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_DITHER
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    This is the dither red width.

1.2.156.7 CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_DITHER_GREEN: Dither green width

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 2
  • Range: 0 - 7
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_DITHER
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    This is the dither green width.

1.2.156.8 CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_DITHER_BLUE: Dither blue width

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 2
  • Range: 0 - 7
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_DITHER
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    This is the dither blue width.

1.2.156.9 CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_FB_BASE: Framebuffer memory start address

  • Type: Hexadecimal
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    If you are using the the LTDC, then you must provide the address of the start of the framebuffer. This address will typically be in the SRAM or SDRAM memory region of the FSMC.

1.2.156.10 CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_FB_SIZE: Framebuffer memory size (bytes)

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 0
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.156.11 Choice: Layer 1 color format

  • Default: STM32_LTDC_L1_RGB565
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_L1_L8: 8 bpp L8 (8-bit CLUT)

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_L1_AL44: 8 bpp AL44 (4-bit alpha + 4-bit CLUT)

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_L1_AL88: 16 bpp AL88 (8-bit alpha + 8-bit CLUT)

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_L1_RGB565: 16 bpp RGB 565

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_L1_ARGB4444: 16 bpp ARGB 4444

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_L1_ARGB1555: 16 bpp ARGB 1555

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_L1_RGB888: 24 bpp RGB 888

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_L1_ARGB8888: 32 bpp ARGB 8888

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.156.12 CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_L2: Enable Layer 2 support

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.156.13 Choice: Layer 2 (top layer) color format

  • Default: STM32_LTDC_L2_RGB565
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_L2
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

Choice Options:

    CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_L2_L8: 8 bpp L8 (8-bit CLUT)

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_L2
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_L2_AL44: 8 bpp AL44 (4-bit alpha + 4-bit CLUT)

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_L2
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_L2_AL88: 16 bpp AL88 (8-bit alpha + 8-bit CLUT)

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_L2
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_L2_RGB565: 16 bpp RGB 565

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_L2
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_L2_ARGB4444: 16 bpp ARGB 4444

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_L2
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_L2_ARGB1555: 16 bpp ARGB 1555

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_L2
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_L2_RGB888: 24 bpp RGB 888

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_L2
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_L2_ARGB8888: 32 bpp ARGB 8888

    • Type: Boolean
    • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_L2
    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.156.14 CONFIG_FB_CMAP: Enable color map support

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC , CONFIG_STM32_LTDC_L1_L8
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Enabling color map suport is neccessary for ltdc L8 format.

1.2.157 Menu: DMA2D Configuration

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_DMA2D
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.157.1 CONFIG_STM32_DMA2D_NLAYERS: Number DMA2D layers

  • Type: Integer
  • Default: 2
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_DMA2D
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

    Number of allocatable DMA2D layers except the LTDC layer.

1.2.157.2 Menu: Supported pixel format

  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_DMA2D
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.157.2.1 CONFIG_STM32_DMA2D_L8: 8 bpp L8 (8-bit CLUT)

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_DMA2D
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.157.2.2 CONFIG_STM32_DMA2D_AL44: 8 bpp AL44 (4-bit alpha + 4-bit CLUT)

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_DMA2D
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.157.2.3 CONFIG_STM32_DMA2D_AL88: 16 bpp AL88 (8-bit alpha + 8-bit CLUT)

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_DMA2D
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.157.2.4 CONFIG_STM32_DMA2D_RGB565: 16 bpp RGB 565

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_DMA2D
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.157.2.5 CONFIG_STM32_DMA2D_ARGB4444: 16 bpp ARGB 4444

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_DMA2D
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.157.2.6 CONFIG_STM32_DMA2D_ARGB1555: 16 bpp ARGB 1555

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_DMA2D
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.157.2.7 CONFIG_STM32_DMA2D_RGB888: 24 bpp RGB 888

  • Type: Boolean
  • Default: y
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_DMA2D
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.157.2.8 CONFIG_STM32_DMA2D_ARGB8888: 32 bpp ARGB 8888

  • Default: n
  • Dependencies: CONFIG_ARCH_ARM, CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_STM32 , CONFIG_STM32_DMA2D
  • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/stm32/Kconfig

1.2.158 Choice: i.MX RT Chip Selection

  • Default: ARCH_CHIP_MIMXRT1052DVL6A

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_MIMXRT1051DVL6A: MIMXRT1051DVL6A

    • Kconfig file: ./arch/arm/src/imxrt/Kconfig

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_MIMXRT1051CVL5A: MIMXRT1051CVL5A

    CONFIG_ARCH_CHIP_MIMXRT1052CVL5A: MIMXRT1052DVL6A
